original_text: Solomon worshipped Ashtoreth, the female god of the Sidonian people. He also worshipped Molech, the wicked god of the Ammonite people.
korean_text: 이는 시돈 사람의 여신 아스다롯을 따르고 암몬 사람의 가증한 밀곰을 따름이라

sentences.original_text: the female god of the Sidonian people
the wicked god of the Ammonite people
